   19: %%
   20: -module(pool_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: -export([basic/1, link_race/1, echo/1]).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames, 1}]}]}].
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [basic, link_race].
   32: 
   33: groups() ->
   34:     [].
   35: 
   36: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   37:     Config.
   38: 
   39: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   40:     ok.
   41: 
   42: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   43:     Config.
   44: 
   45: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: basic(Config) ->
   49: 
   50:     {ok, Peer, Node, PoolNode} = init_pool(?FUNCTION_NAME, basic, Config),
   51: 
   52:     Node = rpc:call(Node, pool, get_node, []),
   53:     PoolNode = rpc:call(Node, pool, get_node, []),
   54: 
   55:     do_echo(Node),
   56:     do_echo(Node),
   57: 
   58:     peer:stop(Peer),
   59:     ok.
   60: 
   61: link_race(Config) ->
   62: 
   63:     {ok, Peer, Node, PoolNode} = init_pool(?FUNCTION_NAME, basic, Config),
   64: 
   65:     Node = rpc:call(Node, pool, get_node, []),
   66:     PoolNode = rpc:call(Node, pool, get_node, []),
   67: 
   68:     rpc:call(Node, pool, pspawn_link, [erlang, is_atom, [?MODULE]]),
   69: 
   70:     peer:stop(Peer),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: do_echo(Node) ->
   74:     EchoPid = rpc:call(Node, pool, pspawn, [?MODULE, echo, [self()]]),
   75:     Ref = EchoPid ! make_ref(),
   76:     receive Ref -> ok after 1000 -> ct:fail(receive M -> M after 0 -> timeout end) end.
   77: 
   78: echo(Parent) ->
   79:     receive Msg ->
   80:             Parent ! Msg
   81:     end.
   82: 
   83: 
   84: init_pool(Case, Name, Config) ->
   85:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   86:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Case}),
   87:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
   88:     file:write_file(filename:join(PrivDir,".hosts.erlang"),"'"++Hostname++"'.\n"),
   89:     ok = rpc:call(Node, file, set_cwd, [PrivDir]),
   90: 
   91:     [PoolNode] = rpc:call(Node, pool, start, [Name]),
   92: 
   93:     Nodes = rpc:call(Node, pool, get_nodes, []),
   94:     [rpc:call(N, code, add_patha, [filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE))]) || N <- Nodes],
   95: 
   96:     {ok, Peer, Node, PoolNode}.
